text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo Lol

Where's .@VP?

Far far away on an aero-plane?
Didn't have time for a fast train?

How do you people keep a straight face. All the lies. 

#coronavirus 
#COVID19 
#RemoveTrump
